name: Suniel Kumar
cooked: Individuals, groups & community - who make their works & creation open are the driving force for Open source hardware . Self Certification should be be the way for promoting open source. A certification process should be created & made available for following, like the best practises.
raw: Individuals, groups & community - who make their works & creation open are the driving force for Open source hardware . Self Certification should be be the way for promoting open source. A certification process should be created & made available for following, like the best practises.
